subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The Czech Republic is one win away from retaining the Fed Cup after Lucie Safarova and Petra Kvitova won the opening singles in straight sets against Serbia, a first-time finalist.
snippet: The Czech Republic is one win away from retaining the Fed Cup after Lucie Safarova and Petra Kvitova won the opening singles in straight sets against Serbia, a first-time finalist.
